name: Pisces
description: Aetis, known as Pisces, rules over emotion and awareness, granting all beings the power to feel the world deeply.

skills.name: Siren's Ward
skills.description: Grants a shield to the weakest ally, absorbing DMG equal to 250% ATK for 8s.

upgrades.level2: Shield Strength increases to 300% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.81)
upgrades.level3: Additionally heals the ally for HP equal to 200% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.141)

skills.name: Pisces Breach
skills.description: Pisces summons a whale to crash down on the target, dealing AoE DMG equal to 360% ATK.

upgrades.level2: DMG increases to 390% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.41)
upgrades.level3: Reduces the target's M-RES by 20% for 6s while dealing DMG. (Unlocks at Lv.101)

skills.name: Splash
skills.description: Launches 2 Flicker Minnows at random enemies, dealing 180% ATK as DMG.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 200% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.21)
upgrades.level3: Increases the number of Flicker Minnows to 3. (Unlocks at Lv.121)
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 220% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.161)
